title: Ukraine Wins S&P Upgrade After Revamp of Growth-Linked Debt
description: Ukraine’s credit score was raised by S&P Global Ratings after the country completed the restructuring of its growth-linked debt into conventional bonds.
content: Ukraine’s credit score was raised by S&P Global Ratings after the country completed the restructuring of its growth-linked debt into conventional bonds.
